description: Deviation modifies components or geometry, then Σ contracts indices.
preconditions: δ does not change the count of indices destined for contraction

effect.index\_behavior: Σ removes only contraction indices; free indices preserved.
effect.null\_mode\_behavior: δ-linear shifts of null modes remain null if δ is purely linear.

notes: Standard case when δ is linear in contracted components; often commutes with δ ∘ Σ up to NF.
